articles.content: Derek Chisora was up to his usual antics as he opted to remain silent throughout the entirety of the final press conference ahead of his rematch against Joseph Parker this weekend, having turned up 2… [+3645 chars]

articles.title: Rudiger picks next club, but agent wants to give Rangnick a helping hand - TEAMtalk
articles.description: Antonio Rudiger has reportedly made clear his transfer preference upon leaving Chelsea - but his agent seemingly wants him to sign for Manchester United.
articles.content:
Antonio Rudiger has reportedly made clear his transfer preference upon leaving Chelsea – but his agent seemingly has other ideas and wants to open talks over a move to Manchester United.
